channel.title: Ddosing/hacking
channel.description:
Hey guys, Some hackers managed to get into all admin accounts, get ip banned, change their ip's demote my owner account, disable me of commands, shutdown server, and come back. How can i prevent these people?
Deven

item.title: Ddosing/hacking
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:9, topic:441120”]Lol, this is really funny.

What source are you using?

And yeah, you’re going to have to check through every file.

Like in my own source I left so many things open and unfixed, vulnerable to huge exploits.[/quote]Shame bro.

Read full topic

item.title: Ddosing/hacking
item.dc:creator: @All_Time_Low All Time Low
item.description:
@All_Time_Low wrote:

Or you left your leeched server un-coded so the original coders can hack into it check commands.java and search “IgnorePlayer” or something and it should show usernames like IgnorePlayerName. “Usernamehere” || idk i think so not so sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Ddosing/hacking
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

[quote=“youridudock, post:4, topic:441120”]They have acces to the server. If you are hosting on a Vps then the Vps may be hacked.
Scan your pc and give no one acces to the server files, only you.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Ddosing/hacking
item.dc:creator: @Demolitionx711 Demolitionx711
item.description:
@Demolitionx711 wrote:

Well, they just get our passes… They use some type of hacking program. Also they ddos, how can i protect the server? Is there a way i can bann them and they cant just change their ip?

Read full topic

item.title: Ddosing/hacking
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

I’m still confused on your situation, but try looking for a master password in your server that let’s anyone access any account with that password.

Also scan your computer for any malicious content; key loggers, hijackers etc.

Read full topic
